original_text:
Blessed be the Lord,
    for he has wondrously shown his steadfast love to me
    when I was in a besieged city.
korean_text: 여호와를 찬송할지어다 견고한 성에서 그의 놀라운 사랑을 내게 보이셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: for he has wondrously shown his steadfast love to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 기이하게 그의 인자하심을 내게 보이셨음이라

sentences.original_text: when I was in a besieged city.
